feed.title: Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
